Components</option> <option value="http://www.element14.com/nextgenbeaglebone">Element14 - Farnell</option> </optgroup> </select> <script> $('select.dropdown').each(function(){ var list = $(this); var action = list.attr('id'); list.change(function(){ $('option:selected', this).each(function(){ var label = $(this).text(); var link = $(this).val(); _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'exit', action, label]); setTimeout('document.location = "' + link + '"', 100) }); }); }); </script>
